hero.title: Useful Software in One Place
hero.subtitle: Discover all the software you need, from games to utilities

company.description: A platform that collects useful software and tools

1.title: 2048 Game
1.description: Addictive puzzle game! Merge same numbers to create the 2048 tile. Simple yet requires strategic thinking.

2.title: Ladder Game
2.description: Need a fair draw? Set participants and results, then climb the ladder. Check results with fun animations.

16.title: Roulette Game
16.description: Weight-based fair roulette! Set items and probabilities freely with stunning animations.

17.title: Color Finder Game
17.description: Brain training game to find different colored squares! Difficulty increases with each level.

100.title: Clock & Stopwatch
100.description: Large digital clock and precise stopwatch! Check time at a glance or measure time accurately.

12.title: IQ Test
12.description: Professional IQ test measuring logic, math, and pattern recognition! Check your intelligence quotient with 16 questions.

13.title: MBTI Personality Test
13.description: Which of 16 personality types are you? Experience the world's most trusted personality assessment.

20.title: Estrogen/Testosterone Test
20.description: What's your estrogen and testosterone tendencies? Fun personality test measuring emotional and logical traits!
